eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.container

Class HCPTableContainer.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.container.HCPTableContainer.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    HCPTableContainer

    public static final class HCPTableContainer.Builder
extends Object
    Mutable class used to construct HCPTableContainer instances.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static HCPTableContainer.HCPSpanDistributionPolicy DEFAULT_POLICY
      By default HCPTableContainer.HCPSpanDistributionPolicy.PROPORTIONAL is used if a policy has not been explicitly set using one of the methods of the builder.

        public HCPTableContainer.Builder addPosition(HCPElement element,
                                             int x,
                                             int y)
        Adds an element at the specified position to the table container. Elements added more than once will also be painted multiple times, even if added to the same position.
        Parameters:
        element - not null
        x - must be >= 0
        y - must be >= 0
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if element is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if x or y is < 0

      • addPosition

        public HCPTableContainer.Builder addPosition(HCPElement element,
                                             int x,
                                             int y,
                                             int horizontalSpan,
                                             int verticalSpan)
        Adds an element at the specified position and with the specified spans to the table container. Elements added more than once will also be painted multiple times, even if added to the same position.
        Parameters:
        element - not null
        x - must be >= 0
        y - must be >= 0
        horizontalSpan - must be >= 1
        verticalSpan - must be >= 1
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if element is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if x or y is < 0
        IllegalArgumentException - if horizontalSpan or verticalSpan is < 1

        Throws:

      • addElements

        public HCPTableContainer.Builder addElements(HCPElement[][] elements,
                                             int x,
                                             int y)
        Adds an array of elements to the table container. The array is treated as a grid, where the first index specifies the y-coordinate and the second index the x-coordinate, i. e. the array is an array of row arrays. This grid is added at the specified position, i. e. the element at [0][0] is added at position (x, y) and the element at [2][5] is added at position (x + 5, y + 2).

        Note: This method permits nulls. If the whole array is null, this method does nothing. If a row array is null, it acts like an empty row and if an element is null nothing is added at this position.

        Elements added more than once will also be painted multiple times.

        Parameters:
        elements - the elements to add; may be null and may contain null
        x - must be >= 0
        y - must be >= 0
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if x or y is < 0

      • build

        public HCPTableContainer build()
        Creates the HCPTableContainer.
        Returns:
        a new HCPTableContainer containing the elements added using this builder
